lines.text: We'll keep an EYE out for you, Stingray.
Yeah, SEE ya.

[after discovering Stingray's fish tank and looking very puzzled]
... What's Stingray have eyeballs in a fish tank for?
She told me she doesn't love me anymore, she don't wanna be with me anymore.
Anna, baby I'm home... Anna, I have a surprise for you... Anna, where are you? I said I'm home... If you're hiding, I'll break your fucking neck!
[Stingray is looking in the mirror with his shirt off]
Anna, I'll find *you.*
[Stingray sprays red streaks in his hair]
You shouldn't have come here Lou. Me and Anna were having a nice time until you showed up.
Are you crazy!... She's DEAD... Wait I didn't mean that!
Hello Anna. Anna you're coming with me.
[Karen tries to kick Stingray]
You're crazy! And my name's not Anna!

[after finding the identity of the murder-rapist]
Paul Taylor, goes by the street-name "Stingray." You know him?

[Shakes head indicating she does not know Stingray]
... but I heard of him. He's pretty brutal. That's why they call him "The Stingray"
Can I help you?
Sure!
[Pulls out a gun]
Your money!
Hey, I just wanna pay for this!
[Puts a coke on the desk]
It's on the house, kid!
[Pushes the kid over, so he slides and lands in front of Nick DiMarco]
Ow.
Hey buddy, you okay?
[the kid nods]
You sure?

[to the cashier]
Money!

[to the robbers]
So... do I get mine on the house too?
No way asshole! You gotta pay!
Now that's not fair. You gave the kid his for free... or maybe you're just too much of a chicken-shit to pick on someone your own size?
He's right, you shouldn't play favors. Okay tough guy, come and get something for free!
Come on, tough guy!
[Nick swiftly pacifies the robber with the gun]
SUCK MAH DICK!
[Nick points his gun towards the robbers crotch, after he pulls a knife and comes toward him]
Suck this, jerk-off!
[Mike enters the store, and sees what's been going on]
Hey come on Nick, we gotta go... what's this?
Just a couple of punks, givin' me a warm-up.
I'll sue you for police-brutality, pig.
Yeah yeah, shut up.
[after seeing Kristi beat up a suspect, making an arrest]
Hold it right there... Kristi, what the hell are you doing?
Nick, I...
I don't wanna hear it! Save it for the station.
[they scuffle a bit]
Kristi, I was worried about you. You stormed out of the morgue on me... Where have you been?
I just needed some time to be alone.

[Disappointed]
Just get in the car.
You have the right to remain silent... so do me a favor and shut up!
